modName: Proper TrickShot or Trick Shot Archery Perk
summary: An Archery perk that Bethesda never implemented.
descriptionHtml:
Warning! This is just as Bethesda left it, it most likely doesn't work AT ALL after you get Bullseye!

HOWEVER, I have released a fully functional version over here = [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54334/?]True Trick Shot[/url] That will work properly even after you get Bullseye...

Before you say anything, YES, I know someone else released this kind of thing before. However I found that his was modified and contained some changes and dirty edits.

I enabled this in the cleanest way possible. There is no changes from the way Bethesda left it. I simply placed it where it would have gone and attempted to leave the greatest compatibility for other Archery skills. I didn't even move any of the other skills.

From my research the stated 25% is either:

A = Not as high as 25%
or
B = Only 25% if your hit your opponent while they are swinging weapons or drawing their bow.

Either way I played with it for awhile and it worked a few times for me.

The perk is just below Bullseye and requires 80 Archery to get it.

Since this is just a implementation of a Bethesda left over I retain no rights to this file.

I added a optional file with one minor change. For those of us that absolutely cannot stand improper grammar I added the missing space so it shows as "Trick Shot".

Only use one or the other....
author: Bethesda
